arguments.subject: Your Invitation to Our Destination Wedding
arguments.body:
Dear Guest,

We are thrilled to invite you to our destination wedding at Sapphire Beach Resort on June 15‑17, 2025. Please let us know if you can join us.

Kind regards,
[Your Names]
